trans-unit.source: Contains meta-information about an individual element within the configuration.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Configuration.ElementInformation> object contains meta-information about an individual element within the configuration.
This object can be used when validating and changing the properties of an individual element.
Gets the errors for the associated element and subelements
The collection containing the errors for the associated element and subelements

Gets a value indicating whether the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object is a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> collection.

`true` if the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object is a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> collection; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object cannot be modified.

The <xref:System.Configuration.ElementInformation.IsLocked%2A> property returns `true` when the related element is locked by the <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowOverride%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>, or <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAllAttributesExcept%2A> property.
`true` if the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object cannot be modified; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value indicating whether the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object is in the configuration file.
`true` if the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object is in the configuration file; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the line number in the configuration file where the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object is defined.
The line number in the configuration file where the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object is defined.
Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> collection of the properties in the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object.
The properties of a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> object are the attributes and subelements associated with that configuration element in the configuration file.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> collection of the properties in the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object.
Gets the source file where the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object originated.
A <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> object may be created in a default state, in which case this property returns `null`.
The source file where the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object originated.
Gets the type of the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object.
The type of the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object.
Gets the object used to validate the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object.
A validator object is not required, and this property may return `null`.
The object used to validate the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object.
